Package com.habitsoft.kiyaa.views

Interface Summary
Focusable  
GeneratedHTMLView  
ModelView<T> Extension of View for the somewhat common case of a View that has getModel() and setModel().
ValueView  
View A user interface component that can load and save its state on demand.
ViewFactory<T extends View>  
 

Class Summary
BaseCollectionView<T>  
ButtonView  
CssTableView A "CSS" table view.
CustomComboBox<T>  
CustomPopup<T>  
DockPanel  
DynamicView Utility view that takes a view as a parameter and shows it.
FrameView  
LabelViewFactory<T> This class makes it easier to define your own ViewFactory that just creates a ModelView with Label in it with a string of your choice based on the model given.
ListView Creator MUST call setViewFactory() before adding the view to the UI.
LoadView  
NoWaitView View which returns immediately from load() without waiting for its subview(s) to load.
TableView<T>  
ViewAction Action which can load/save a view before/after being performed.
WhenView This is used to implement lazy conditional subview inside templates, but of course you can use it elsewhere.
WidgetWrapperView Class to wrap a normal widget into a view, so it can be used by some of the classes that normally wrap something more complex.
WithView Create a scoped variable with a given value.
